titles.title: A bill to designate the Wildcat River in the State of New Hampshire as a unit of the National Wild and Scenic River System.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Agriculture Department, Interior Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 100-369.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 702.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Interior Department.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Agriculture Department. Favorable.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. Report No: 100-904.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Message on House action received in Senate and held at desk: House amendment to Senate bill.

vote.text: Senate agreed to the House amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 9/13/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate Wildcat River, New Hampshire, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a Wildcat River Advisory Commission to assist in implementing this Act. Terminates such commission ten years after enactment of this Act. Authorizes appropriations.
